verses.roman:
kāśī-miśrera āvāse nibhṛte eka ghara
prabhu tāṅre dila, āra sevāra kiṅkara

synonyms: kāśī-miśrera—of Kāśī Miśra; āvāse—at the house; nibhṛte—solitary; eka—one; ghara—room; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto Paramānanda Purī; dila—gave; āra—and; sevāra—to serve him; kiṅkara—one servant.
translation: There was a solitary room at Kāśī Miśra's house, and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu gave it to Paramānanda Purī. He also gave him one servant.
